column1: Little Goat Diner////After being rejected by Au Cheval
column2: we had dinner at Little Goat . The Nachos were delicious especially the mash beans and the pork belly . We had the club sandwich
column3: it was OK. The Ruben was excellent . The fries were a disappointment
column4: too salty and the smoke flavor was too strong . The portions were huge
column5: we ended up eating half of our plates . Our server was excellent and helpful .
